LanguageData.DesignatorDestroyThingDesc: Burns chosen item at closest campfire, destroying it completely. Requires campfire or smelter to work.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateWeaponOrApparel: Item must be a weapon or an apparel.
LanguageData.DesignatorRecycleThingDesc: Recycle chosen item to get valuables resources out of it. If item can be smelted it will require smelter to get recycled, otherwise it will be scrapped on it's location.
